name: dockcheck
description: Dockcheck is a CLI tool to automate checking and updating Docker containers. It helps users be notified when new images are available, and supports automated restarts, making it ideal for self-hosted environments.
features: Automated Checking: Scan for container updates automatically. Stay current effortlessly.
Update Notifications: Get alerts when new images are available. Never miss updates.
Automated Restarts: Optionally restart containers after updates. Hands-free maintenance.
CLI Interface: Simple command-line tool for quick checks. Script-friendly operation.
Homelab Perfect: Ideal for self-hosted environments. Maintain your stack easily.
Lightweight: Minimal resource usage for efficient monitoring. Run on any system.
